Definition in file resetReason.h.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum HAL_ResetReason_t

The reset reason types.

Enumerator:
NULL_PTR_DEREF_RESET  jump to the NULL pointer was issued.
POWER_ON_RESET  the supply voltage was below reset threshold.
EXTERNAL_RESET  a low level was present on RESET pin.
BROWN_OUT_RESET  the supply voltage was below Brown-out reset threshold. Set by fuses.
WDT_RESET  Watch Dog Timer period expired.
JTAG_RESET  MCU was reset by JTAG.
WARM_RESET  software reset.
